sensory_systems.name: Advanced Dough Rheology Sensor
sensory_systems.description: A multi-modal sensor array capable of continuously monitoring dough properties in real-time: viscosity, elasticity, gluten development, and hydration levels. Utilizes a combination of shear stress sensors, extensometers, and near-infrared spectroscopy for rapid analysis.

technical_specifications.accuracy: Viscosity: ±0.5 Pa·s, Elasticity: ±5% strain, Hydration: ±0.2% (by weight)

sensory_systems.name: Flavor & Aroma Profiling System
sensory_systems.description: A hyperspectral imaging and gas chromatography-mass spectrometry (GC-MS) system integrated for real-time flavor and aroma analysis. Identifies volatile organic compounds (VOCs) and their concentrations, correlating them with dough composition and baking parameters.

sensory_systems.name: Visual Inspection System (AI-Powered)
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution camera system coupled with deep learning algorithms for automated assessment of crust color, crumb structure, and overall bread quality.  Capable of identifying imperfections and deviations from target specifications.

technical_specifications.accuracy: Crust Color Deviation: ±0.2 ΔE (CIE color space)

control_systems.name: Model Predictive Control (MPC) System
control_systems.description: A sophisticated control system utilizing real-time sensor data and a dynamic bread baking model to optimize baking parameters (temperature, humidity, mixing time, proofing time) for consistent product quality.

technical_specifications.algorithm: MPC with Polynomial Chaos Expansion for Uncertainty Quantification

control_systems.name: Adaptive Mixing System
control_systems.description: A dynamically adjustable mixer that can modify speed, torque, and ingredient addition rates based on real-time dough rheology data and the baking model's predictions.

mechanical_systems.name: Automated Dough Handling System
mechanical_systems.description: A robotic system for precise ingredient dispensing, dough transfer, and shaping. Includes a pneumatic conveying system and a robotic arm with force feedback.

mechanical_systems.name: Precision Oven System
mechanical_systems.description: A computer-controlled oven with independent temperature zones, humidity control, and automated door operation.  Utilizes infrared sensors for precise temperature monitoring.

software_integration.name: Digital Twin Platform
software_integration.description: A real-time simulation and control platform integrating all sensory data, control algorithms, and mechanical system data.  Allows for process optimization, fault detection, and predictive maintenance.

software_integration.name: Recipe Management System
software_integration.description: A software system for managing bread recipes, ingredient variations, and baking parameters.  Supports automated recipe generation based on desired product characteristics.

future_technology.timeline_estimate: Overall timeline: 5-15 years, with significant advancements occurring within the next 5-10 years.
